subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Lonnie Chisenhall and Casey Kotchman had three R.B.I. apiece as the Indians ended Reds’ six-game winning streak on Monday. The Cubs placed Ryan Dempster on the disabled list.
snippet: Lonnie Chisenhall and Casey Kotchman had three R.B.I. apiece as the Indians ended Reds’ six-game winning streak on Monday. The Cubs placed Ryan Dempster on the disabled list.
